page.title: 04NORTH WILLINGHAM _ SUMMARY
page.content: Village at foot of Wolds astride A631 winding through with series of sharp bends to climb steep hill up to Wolds. Population est. at 76 adults & 37 children. 37 dwellings including 5 farms & 3 tied cottages are mostly owner_occupied. Originally 4 Council Houses but all sold off to tenants. 32 Houses have car & 26 on telephone and there is public 'phone kiosk. Mains water & Electricity; Sewerage by Septic Tank; Police cover from Market Rasen which also provides most of Doctors. Library Van fortnightly. One bus weekly to Louth for shopping on Wed. Post Office in cottage but no shopping facility. Milkman on altern_ _ate days and fresh fish by van weekly _ Newspapers delivered. Children to School at Mkt. Rasen. On Willingham Hill is a Public Weighbridge.
